## Vector

#### Row vector, 1 × n-matrix

<div class="column-left">
```{r}
x <- 1:3
x
```
</div>
<div class="column-right">
```{julia}
x = [1 2 3];
x
```
</div>
<div class="clear">
</div>

#### Column vector, m × 1-matrix
<div class="column-left">
```{r}
x <- t(1:3)
x
```
</div>
<div class="column-right">
```{julia}
x = [1 2 3]';
x
```
</div>
<div class="clear">
</div>

## String
<div class="column-left">
```{r}
x <- "Hello, R"
x
```
</div>
<div class="column-right">
```{julia}
x = "Hello, Julia";
x
```
</div>
<div class="clear">
</div>

#### Concatenate	
<div class="column-left">
```{r}
x <- paste("Hello,", "R")
x
```
</div>
<div class="column-right">
```{julia}
x = "Hello," * "julia";
x = string("Hello,", "julia"); 
x
```
</div>
<div class="clear">
</div>

#### Replicate
<div class="column-left">
```{r}
x <- paste(rep('a', 5), collapse='')
x
```
</div>
<div class="column-right">
```{julia}
x = repeat("a", 3)
x = 'a'^3
x
```
</div>
